verses.name: Ezekiel 18:9
verses.text: Hath walked in my statutes, and hath kept my judgments, to deal truly; he is just, he shall surely live, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:10
verses.text: If he beget a son that is a robber, a shedder of blood, and that doeth the like to any one of these things,

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:11
verses.text: And that doeth not any of those duties, but even hath eaten upon the mountains, and defiled his neighbour’s wife,

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:12
verses.text: Hath oppressed the poor and needy, hath spoiled by violence, hath not restored the pledge, and hath lifted up his eyes to the idols, hath committed abomination,
